unnormalised: Hey guys, about return policies, right? I once ordered a saree online for Diwali from a shop in Chandni Chowk. Turned out the colour was totally different! Luckily, they had a hassle-free return. Hope all retailers follow a similar policy. Nothing worse than getting stuck with something you can't use, especially if it's for Onam or a special occasion. Good return policies build trust, yaar!
